title: Senior Software Developer
description: Designed and developed SaaS-based backend solutions using C#, .NET Core, and SQL Server implementing MVC architecture. Managed cloud infrastructure on Azure using Terraform with provision for Autoscaling and on-demand configuration

title: Senior Software Analyst
description: Worked on the modernization of legacy apps to Single Page Application using ReactJS, ASP .NET Web API, ExpressJS, NodeJS and SQL. Migrated/Rebuilt all the apis from Monolyth to Microservices Architecture (MVC Design pattern)

title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained business-critical .NET Core and MVC applications with optimized database back-ends. Led the development of automated test suites using Selenium and C#, enhancing regression testing efficiency.
